pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Lavender Essential Oil 25ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

This oil is reputed for relaxation, inner peace and healing.

Also useful for: Headaches, stress, insomnia, insect bites, eczema and inflamed skin

A sweet, floral-herbaceous scent with a slight woody undertone

Ingredients

Lavandula angustifolia herb top flowering 1mL/mL

Directions

Adult: For the temporary relief of HEADACHES, STRESS and INSOMNIA: massage 2-3 drops directly onto forehead, temples and back of neck. To treat INSECT BITES, INFLAMED SKIN and for the relief of symptoms of ECZEMA: add 5 drops to 10mL base oil and apply to affected area. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner.
